column5: Saw a window in what otherwise would turn out to be a rainy messy day and took it...got to the river and fished it right before the rain made it too dirty/too high ...it actually started as a very nice sunny day....but quickly changed to the oposite...the "usual" 2/6 day...landed the bigger and lost the smaller ones....one of them had a nasty lamprey mark on the side....anyhow....decent start of the year...in the absence of any ice around the steelies may have to do it for a while longer....couple shots bellow...              Cheers,  Ice Fisherman
The one in the first pic is a chunker...  Nice catch...
Attaboy Emil You've adapted very well to steelhead fishing Great job Thanks for sharing Jacques
